house_listing.house_description: Large den would make wonderful master bedroom with fireplace very large living room,gorgeous hardwood floors throughout except in den-oversized lot with storage shed-brick ranchnew front roof. Freshly painted. Seller pays $2100 cc. Large country kitchen.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Fenced, Ranch Style
